import React, {useContext, useState} from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = () => { const [menu, setMenu] = useState("shop"); const {getTotalCartItems} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

SHOPPER

  • setMenu("shop")}>Shop{menu ==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • setMenu("mens")}>Men{menu ==="mens"?
    :<>}
  • setMenu("womens")}>Women{menu ==="womens"?
    :<>}
  • setMenu("kids")}>Kids {menu ==="kids"?
    :<>}
{getTotalCartItems()}
) } export default Navbar;
